fr.univ.lille1.interfaces

Interface Authentication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationBasicImpl, AuthenticationOriginalImpl

    public interface Authentication
    This interface authentification allow us to get session object for the client on our server it read the HttpHeader in order to do that
    Author:
    Durigneux Antoine, Scouflaire Emmanuel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientSession getClientSession(javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders requestHttpHeaders)
      This method read the httpHeader in order to read the information of the current user and it generate an object that we use during the connexion of each command
      boolean isValidUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method connect to the ftpserver in order to verify if the user is real and have access to the server
